question: In which of the following neighboring countries, the Festival of India has started?
explanation: In Nepal, a month-long \'Festival of India\' has started in Kathmandu to familiarize the new generation of the country about the similarities between the two countries. The festival, organised by the   Indian Embassy and Swami Vivekananda Cultural Centre, is being held in Kathmandu and other major cities of Nepal from February 19th to March 21st.
